job title: Data & Documentation Analyst with Paralegal Skills
job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce has a client in Southern Chester County, Pennsylvania (PA) that is seeking a Data and Documentation Analyst with Paralegal Skills.

Summary:
This is a great opportunity for a Paralegal to make a move into corporate with a stable company. This position is a key role in the Operations group that specializes in regulatory, documentation, and process management for one of the company's primary lines of business (dealing with derivatives and hedging). This company offers fantastic growth opportunity, excellent work-life balance, and a sought-after culture. This company has been voted as a top place to work for over 10 years running.

Responsibilities include:
  • Working with commercial real estate loan contracts
  • Serving as the team's subject matter expert and resource on derivatives regulation from a process perspective
  • Working closely with the advisory team to learn the impact of emerging regulations on the team's transaction process
  • Reviewing documentation for key analytical data and much more analytical and operational project work
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Bachelor's degree
  • 1 - 5 years of paralegal experience
  • Good math skills
Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
